text: Then We made Our messengers to follow in their footsteps and We made Jesus, the Son of Mary, to follow and gave him the Gospel, and placed compassion and mercy in the hearts of those who followed him. And they invented monasticism*, We did not prescribe it for them, only to seek God’s pleasure, but they did not observe it with the observation due to it. So We gave to those who believed from among them, their reward, and most of them are transgressors. * Seclusion from worldly life. him.
